job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Golang
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description:
We are looking for a dedicated, hard-working
Sr. Software Engineer
with expertise in Golang to complement our existing engineering staff. This position can be based out of our Lake Mary, FL location, or remote.
We are a group that is passionate about making the Internet a safer place by helping identify the “who” behind malicious activity. As a Software Engineer at
Team Cymru
, you will be at the forefront of threat intelligence and surrounded by highly experienced professionals in the field of Internet Security.
The right individual will share our passion and Mission to
Save and Improve Human Lives
by making the Internet safer. Team Cymru is THE LEADER in Internet intelligence providing unparalleled global coverage and insight to better monitor, analyze, and predict online activity.
The skills you need
5+ years’ experience in enterprise software engineering
5+ years’ experience with Linux
1+ years’ experience with Golang
1+ years’ experience writing and using automated tests
1+
years’ experience
as a team lead, leading 3+ other engineers
Experience with Agile Software Development methodologies
Experience creating highly concurrent systems
Deep understanding of fundamental Internet concepts
Ability to work effectively with various technical and non-technical departments
Ability to work effectively with geographically distributed teams
Ability to create and maintain SQL Database schemas
Ability to assess and improve SQL Query performance
Ability to use git for version control and code maintenance
The attitude you need
Passion for Software Development
Not afraid of asking questions
Enjoy learning and overcoming challenges
Place high value on collaboration and team success
Communication: early and often
Your day-to-day will involve
Writing code
Planning development cycles for team
Distilling concrete requirements from higher level strategic goals
Guiding and tasking the team to meet deliverables
Providing technical mentorship
Tracking deliverables and coordinating with various teams and stakeholders
Performing code reviews with the team
Technologies you will be working with
Golang
CentOS
PostgreSQL
ElasticSearch
Kafka
Kubernetes
Scala
Min.io
Ansible
Jenkins
Atlassian stack: JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket
What We Offer
Competitive pay
Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance
Substantial PTO
Company-matched 401(k) plan
The most important benefit of working at Team Cymru is the privilege of being part of a company that works every day towards accomplishing our Mission:
To Save and Improve Human Lives
.
This job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change, or new ones may be assigned at any time with or without notice.
Team Cymru is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race, color, sex, religion, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state, or local laws.
